title: Launcher is NOT saving download progress.
body: Well, the game is around 15GB in size. My internet connection is pretty stable, and i dont have any issues when im playing. But when i have to download something, it sometimes disconnecting. ~1 time for 2 hours. And i see that launcher is not saving progress like other launchers do (or my computer is broken) so i can't download it. When im downloading my connection is about 500kb/s. Sorry for bad english

replies.body: You might run into issues if your hard drive is full, or you're saving files outside of your internal primary (like an external drive).  If those are ruled out, your connection might have some slight degradation, which can cut you off and restart the process.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case to make sure your network to our patching server is in good shape.
But, I have to know. Is LoL launcher SUPPOSED to save progress?
Nope, it would instead rescan all of your game files for corruption then restart the process.
Hooray!  An explanation. So what's the solution here, because I'm sick of my launcher crashing and I have to START ALL MY progress over.{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
